name: LearnAllahsnames-EnglishQuranIslamMuslim
0:
”Alexa, open allahs names”
”Alexa, start allahs names”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: allahs names
des:
This 99 names of Allah learning tool is version 1.0 and I do sincerely apologize if the pronunciation from your device is not accurate. My intention is to begin perfecting spiritual learning skills for Alexa devices and I would never intentionally disrespect any righteous belief system. PBWY

Alexa can help you learn new topics or study for your test. You can review the flash cards and then test your knowledge. At any point you can say "Alexa, review mode" to switch to review or say "Alexa, test mode" to start a test. You can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next card. At any point during the test, you can say "Alexa, what's my score" to get your current test score.
Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
